summary.p1: Preference for the (x)ERN stack, transforming designs into responsive webs. I'm fluent in HTML5, CSS3, and (Java|Type)Script.
summary.p2: I am currently more interested on FrontEnd development, but I have a blast developing BackEnd mainly with Node.js while learning new technologies and already having experience in many others.
summary.p3: I do love staying up-to-date with the latest trends, and my commitment is to deliver work that can be easily maintained and evolved without too much suffering (if possible).
summary.p4: Mountaineer ⛰️, cat petter 🐱, tireless gamer 🎮 and disastrous photographer 📷.
